Interface MerchandiseRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Merchandise,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Merchandise,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Merchandise,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Merchandise,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Merchandise,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Merchandise>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Merchandise,Long>
@Repository public interface MerchandiseRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Merchandise,Long>
Repository interface for accessing Merchandise entities from the database.

This interface extends JpaRepository, providing methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on Merchandise entities. Additionally, it defines custom queries to retrieve merchandise data based on specific criteria.

This interface includes:

  • deliveriesByTime(LocalDate, LocalDate, Long): Retrieves a list of merchandise delivered by a specific supplier within a given time range.
  • storeInventory(Long): Retrieves a list of merchandise available in a specific store where the quantity is greater than zero.

See Also:
  • Merchandise

  • Method Details

    • deliveriesByTime

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM Merchandise WHERE supplierID = :supplierID AND production_date BETWEEN :start AND :end", nativeQuery=true) List<Merchandise> deliveriesByTime(@Param("start") LocalDate start, @Param("end") LocalDate end, @Param("supplierID") Long supplierID)
      Retrieves a list of Merchandise delivered by a specific supplier within a given time range.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date of the delivery period.
      end - The end date of the delivery period.
      supplierID - The ID of the supplier.
      Returns:
      A list of Merchandise objects delivered by the supplier between the specified dates.

    • storeInventory

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE storeID = :store AND quantity > 0", nativeQuery=true) List<Merchandise> storeInventory(@Param("store") Long storeID)
      Retrieves a list of merchandise available in a specific store where the quantity is greater than zero.
      Parameters:
      storeID - The ID of the store.
      Returns:
      A list of Merchandise objects available in the specified store.
